data.message: I like Facebook but I abhor the mobile app. It's the worst app on the planet

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Tito.  We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1rmVirO. -Jenny

If Facebook really wanted to improve your "Facebook experience " they wouldn't have done away with messaging on the fb app . It was great till they tried to force people into the messenger app . I tried it then deleted it , it was too rediculous to even fool with ,it's made fb almost useless to me .
Is that the one which put floating heads on my phone screen ? I can't make them go away...
